title: The Love of Europa: Limited Time Edition
description: "The Love of Europa" is a novel of sensual passion and adventure following the life of Nausicaâ€™a, a romantic young woman from Greece who wanders Europe and the world in search of life's meaning as well as the meaning of herself, and the meaning of her soul."SHE CALLED HERSELF EUROPAand wandered the world from girlhood till death.She lived every kind of life and dreamt every kind of dream.She was wild in her wandering, a drop of free water.She belonged to no man and to no city.She believed only in her lifeand in her dreams.Her god was Beauty."
author: Roman Payne
